name: Adam Fazzani
designation: Founder | The Communication platform built for an Industry. üî® | Product-led startup
date: July 5, 2022, Adam worked with Buwaneka but they were at different companies
des: I've had the pleasure of working alongside Buwaneka over the last 2 years, where he's worked as a front end developer for our early stage startup, mobile first, communication platform (GoTradie). He not only brings technical knowledge & experience, plus awesome output but his personality and energy makes him a true legend to work with. All round top bloke üëç

name: Sajith Weerakoon
des: Buwaneka has been quite instrumental in building the GoTradie mobile app. He was the first frontend engineer in the team. Buwaneka is a fast learner and a dedicated engineer who has shown exemplary characteristics as a go-getter. He has consistently shown the customer obsession mindset in his work and often has contributed to the product beyond mere software development. I congratulate Buwaneka for all his great successes at GoTradie and wish him strength to continue his great work.

name: Sajitha Tharaka Pathirana
designation: Lead Test Automation Engineer | SDET | Test Automaton | QA |  Java | Selenium | REST Assured | Appium | ISTQB¬Æ
date: October 19, 2021, Sajitha Tharaka worked with Buwaneka but on different teams
des: Buwaneka is a well-experienced engineer who has shown expertise in the front end and as well back end. He is very keen on learning new technologies and is always trying to apply his learnings during the day at work. It is my pleasure to work with Buwaneka and I would recommend his expertise to anyone who is looking for a good engineer.

name: Sahan Wijesekara
designation: Software Engineer (Scala | Java) at Software Stylers pvt Ltd
date: May 8, 2017, Sahan reported directly to Buwaneka
des: During that time, Buwaneka proved to be incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. He always had an efficient strategy lined up to make our work go smoothly and was excellent in communicating his ideas to the rest of the team. I`m working under his leadership.
